title: Roswell Rudd's MALIcool with Toumani Diabate (2002)
description:
Jazz trombonist Roswell Rudd seeks out the elusive Toumani DiabatÃƒÂ© - a master of the unusual 21-string harp-like kora - and his ensemble in Mali, and the resulting sessions are fresh, exciting, exasperating and completely unique.
   
Ã¢â‚¬Å“MALIcoolÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ (2002) features, along with the kora, the banjo-like ngoni, the tuned percussion of the balafon, guitar, bass and percussion.
 
The blend is infectious and appealing on a variety of levels. Melodic and danceable, this may be Rudd's most accessible record, yet for all its engaging characteristics, it never fails to be imaginative and audacious.
